edge_1: Lily was Dr. John Dolittle's wife who passed away at sea, leading him to retreat from human society and only tend to animals.
edge_2: Dr. John Dolittle was summoned by Queen Victoria to treat her illness caused by poisoning with nightshade. Dr. Blair Müdfly, who is Dolittle's lifelong rival, was also present during the examination.

edge_1: Dr. John Dolittle was invited to Queen Victoria's palace to treat her illness caused by poisoning with nightshade.
edge_2: Dr. John Dolittle was summoned by Queen Victoria to treat her illness caused by poisoning with nightshade. Dr. Blair Müdfly, who is Dolittle's lifelong rival, was also present during the examination.

edge_1: Dolittle tries to steal Lily's journal from Rassouli, who apprehends him and locks him in with a moody tiger named Barry.
edge_2: Rassouli loans Dolittle a ship to chase after Müdfly because he learns that Dolittle is trying to honor Lily's memory with his expedition and he also misses her.

edge_1: Dolittle stalls Barry until Chee-Chee locates him and finds the courage to defeat him.
edge_2: Dolittle brings his expedition to Monteverde, ruled over by Lily's father King Rassouli.
